#summary How to install and run from a downloaded zip archive.
#labels installation,binary

= Installing and running Alien Rabble from a .zip archive =

Follow these instructions to start using the Alien Rabble application from a zip file you have downloaded


== Detailed instruction ==

  # Unzip the archive file AR.zip into a new folder onto your local drive (e.g. C:/AR )

 # In the AR directory open the init.xml file. Change the participant details as appropriate.

 # Open a command window, making sure you are in the new AR directory 

 #  Type the following command

java -Djava.library.path=./lib -jar ./AlienRabble_fat.jar
